Author: Isaidbiiiitttttttchh
Text: Hugs friend! You are valid and your feelings are important.   Everyone is deserving of help. One thing to think about is what we do to our bodies have lasting effects that we might not see immediate effects from but will show up as we age. It helps me to think about it like smoking, you might not see and negative impacts for the first few years but we know it ups your risk cancer and lung disorders.    I’m so sorry you’re having a rough time and I hope your IRL friends offer you comfort and support
